thread.title: Rex Tillerson Meets With Mexico's Foreign Minister, Will Visit Mexico City - NBC News
thread.title_full: Rex Tillerson Meets With Mexico's Foreign Minister, Will Visit Mexico City - NBC News

author: Phil Helsel
title: Rex Tillerson Meets With Mexico's Foreign Minister, Will Visit Mexico City - NBC News
text:
JAN. 26: Border Battle: Mexican Pres. Pe?a Nieto Cancels Meeting with Pres. Trump 2:24 autoplay autoplay Copy this code to your website or blog <iframe src="http://www.nbcnews.com/widget/video-embed/863681091854" width="560" height="315" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe> 
Trump has also taken a hard line on illegal immigration and in the past pledged to deport all of those in the country illegally, although in November he seemed to soften his stance and said he would focus on those with criminal convictions. Another order Trump has signed since taking office significantly boosts the U.S. Border Patrol. 
In a video released by Mexico's foreign ministry, Videgaray described the meeting as "a cordial conversation about coordination on migration and security." He said "we spoke about the need for Mexican migrants to be treated with respect and due process regardless of the deportations." 
"We told the secretary that we will be increasing support for Mexican migrants in our consulates in the U.S.," Videgaray said. 
Related: Mexican Lawmakers Grapple With Trump, and What Comes Next 
A date for Tillerson's trip to Mexico was not announced. 
Mexican President Enrique Pe単a Nieto canceled a planned trip to the U.S. last month over Trump's rhetoric. The two leaders later spoke on a prearranged phone call and "agreed at this point not to speak publicly about this controversial issue," Mexico's government said at the time. 
When asked about Pe単a Nieto possibly rescheduling his visit to Washington, Videgaray said "not for now." Play
